item.description:
UPDATE:  We will meet just outside of the hotel bar in the lobby area on Saturday at 12:00 PM to chat and grab lunch.  We can also meet on Sunday at 12:00 PM if people can't make Sat.  I will be wearing a red or navy blue cloak.

"New England's largest and most diverse science fiction and fantasy convention." Let's meet up and explore the con together, or for lunch/dinner to share experiences if our time and interests conflict. Pre-reg is $50 for 4 days before Dec 31st, then $60 afterwards.

At the door day rates:
Friday - $20
Saturday - $40
Sunday - $30
Monday - $10

I plan on attending starting Friday evening or Sat morning until Monday. More info to come on exactly when and where to congregate.

http://2013.arisia.org/
item.name: Arisia 2013
